page.title: 18Local Businesses
page.content: There are about{120 customers}a day. The Post Office sells about{Â£200}worth of stamps a week,and also deals with pensions and family allowances.The Post Office is open from 9.00 to 5.00 for 4 days a week .Half days are Weds.and Sat.The Shop opens at 8.30 and it sell confectionary, cigarettes, groceries,cool drinks,wines,spirits, chemist items,hardware and coal. About {147 newspapers}a day are delivered. The most popular newspapers are the {"Daily Express"}and{"The People". _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ {Mr.Willett _ Dairy Farmer ========================= Mr.and Mrs.Willett own a dairy farm called{Town Farm.}They have{80 cows. Each cow gives about{25L.of milk a day so they get about{2,000L.}a day. They have had{30 calves}this year.A cow's pregnancy is{9 months}and they calve
